title: Get Fit Under the Guidance Company Fitness Training Centers (Louise Friesen)
text: By Louise Friesen Oct 2, 2015 Fitness has become the buss word across all ages across the world. However, fitness does not mean losing weight as was the popular belief even a few years ago, today people who aim for real fitness are not only aiming for losing weight but also a fitter body, agile mind and improved body strength. Especially in Canada, fitness freaks are searching for programs that would not only help them in losing weight but enhance the above mentioned qualities and skills in the trainers. This need has fueled the up springing of many fitness centers around Calgary, Okotoks, Airdrie, Chestermere, Langdon and Indus among other areas in Canada. These centers are unique in their approach as they are offering a variety of ancient and modern fighting techniques and arts as means of fitness. These centers often referred to as kid's or women's boot camp center across Canada, aim to train beginner into expert fighters and in the process attain perfect body fitness and health. These centers have a great team of trainers who are committed to train and guide their students in the perfect way. Moreover, these centers have a highly motivating and fun atmosphere in classes and make sure that the aggression trained in the different programs does not tickle within the students. Moreover, these fitness and training centers have a schedule of classes that has been distributed across the week making sure that each student get to enroll in the type of physical activity or martial art that interests him or her. Moreover, most of these centers also prove personal training facilities who want to put in extra effort to improve their technique.Different training styles Most of these fitness training centers in Canada offer a range of different training styles or services that a trainee can choose from. Let's discuss in details about some of the styles taught.* Muay Thai Classes - This is a warfare boxing sport that has its origin in Thailand and uses different clinching techniques and stand-up striking as defense technique. * Brazilian Jujitsu - This combat sport had its origin in Brazil as well as Japan and is a self-defense structure that focuses on ground fighting. Through this type of defense technique even the short and weak can protect themselves.* Boxing Classes - Boxing has always been a great defense combat sport that has seen its popularity increase with the passage of time. That is the reason most of these centers have women's kick boxing classes with ordinary boxing training.* Judo Classes - Through this sport an unarmed person can train one's body and mind to hold and leverage to unbalance an opponent.* MMA Stand-up - MMA stands for mixed martial arts training classes where a trainee is trained under specially designed classes that involve the best techniques of different martial arts.* Company Fitness Training - These offer simple fitness training programs with ordinary physical exercises. * Dry Land Training - This is a type of athletic training that are aimed to improve the skills of different other sports like swimming and skating. About the Author Louise is based in CALGARY in Canada. She has been trying to get fit but always lost interest but enrolling in a women's boot camp in Calgary has changed her life for better. She describes herself as a fitness freak and loves to write on this topic. Rating:
